name: Elemental Resonance: Enduring Rock
description:
During this round, after your character deals Geo DMG next time: Should there be any Combat Status on your side that provides Shield, grant one such Status with 3 Shield points. 
(You must have at least 2 Geo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw: During this round, after your character deals $[K106] next time: Should there be any Combat Status on your side that provides $[K6], grant one such Status with 3 $[K6] points. \n(You must have at least 2 <color=#FFE699FF>Geo</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced: During this round, after your character deals {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color> next time: Should there be any Combat Status on your side that provides {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color>, grant one such Status with 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> points. \n(You must have at least 2 <color=#FFE699FF>Geo</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: Bedrock shall make the hills unshakable.
